issue.title: [Rust] parquet-format should be released by Apache process
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6256](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6256). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Arrow parquet crate depends on the parquet-format crate [1]. Parquet-format 2.6.0 was recently released and has breaking changes compared to 2.5.0.

This means that previously published Arrow Parquet/DataFusion crates are now unusable out the box [2].

We should bring parquet-format into an Apache release process to avoid this type of issue in the future.

 

[1] <https://github.com/sunchao/parquet-format-rs>

[2] https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6255

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6256?focusedCommentId=16913848) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Unclear if this is resolvable in time for Arrow 0.15.0. You need to have a discussion on either the Parquet or Arrow mailing lists about how to proceed.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6256?focusedCommentId=16924611) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Moving out of 0.15.0

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6256?focusedCommentId=17011051) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Moving to 1.0.0, not urgent for 0.16.0

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6256?focusedCommentId=17023843) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
We really need to address this prior to 1.0.0 ... we have run into issues multiple times where we are blocked on this external library.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6256?focusedCommentId=17056555) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
There are several steps that have to be undertaken to make this happen. Do one of you want to start a discussion on the Parquet mailing list about next steps?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6256?focusedCommentId=17135980) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I haven't seen any movement on this so I'm removing it from the 1.0.0 milestone

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6256?focusedCommentId=17233428) by Rémi Dettai (rdettai):*
This issue is still pending. I did not find any discussion around this in the parquet mailing list, have you started one last time?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6256?focusedCommentId=17284185) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
`[~sunchao]` added Neville and Andy as maintainers of the crate, as a workaround.
We can revisit this if it ever becomes an issue again.
